CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Apex Credit relative to Emerald Capital?
SRP.A: Apex Credit is {below} Emerald Capital in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aura Finance relative to Apex Credit?
SRP.A: Aura Finance is {below} Apex Credit in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aura Finance relative to Starlight Loans?
SRP.A: Aura Finance is {below} Starlight Loans in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total mortgage rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Aura Finance}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total mortgage rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Titan Lending}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Apex Credit's maximum Mortgage Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Apex Credit's maximum Mortgage Rate is in {2000}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Titan Lending's maximum Mortgage Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Titan Lending's maximum Mortgage Rate is in {2009}.

NC.Q: Between 1990 and 1995, was the average total Mortgage Rate higher or lower than between 1998 and 2005?
NC.A: The average total mortgage rate between 1990 and 1995 was {lower} than between 1998 and 2005.

NC.Q: Between 1992 and 2005, did the total Mortgage Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1996 and 1998?
NC.A: The change in total mortgage rate between 1992 and 2005 was {larger} than between 1996 and 1998.

NC.Q: Between 1992 and 1995, did the total Mortgage Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1995 and 2001?
NC.A: The change in total mortgage rate between 1992 and 1995 was {smaller} than between 1995 and 2001.

NC.Q: Was the total Mortgage Rate in 1996 higher or lower than in 2008?
NC.A: The total mortgage rate in 1996 was {lower} than in 2008.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Aura Finance} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Apex Credit and Aura Finance first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Apex Credit and Aura Finance first exchanged leading positions in {1985}.
